business.headline: World's largest container ship MSC IRINA docks at Vizhinjam SeaportMSC IRINA's docking at Vizhinjam International Seaport signals growing confidence in the port's readiness to handle Ultra-Large Container Vessels (ULCVs).
Sensex opens 382 points higher, Nifty above 25,100; Axis Bank gains over 1%The S&P BSE Sensex added 335.02 points to 82,524.01, while the NSE Nifty50 added 114.85 points to 25,117.90 as of 9:28 am.

Stock market opening: Will Sensex, Nifty continue market rally today?As per Gift Nifty futures, the Nifty50 is expected to open above Friday's close of 25,003.05. The futures were trading at 25,182 around 8:35 am, suggesting a stronger start to the new trading session.

Stocks to watch on June 9: HDFC Bank, Infosys, Airtel, Tata Steel, MCX, BELThe policy announcements by the RBI improved market sentiment and pushed indices higher. As trading begins on Monday, investors will be looking at some key companies and developments that may impact share prices.

QuBeats bags Rs 25 crore defence grant to build quantum navigation for Indian NavyThe startup will use the money to build a Quantum Positioning System (QPS) for the Indian Navy. This system will help naval ships and submarines navigate even in places where GPS does not work.

RBI rate cut lights up Dalal Street, but will the rally continue?The RBI reduced the repo rate to 5.5% and also changed its policy stance from 'accommodative' to 'neutral', suggesting that it will now wait and watch before making further moves.

India's poverty rate sees sharp decline, falls to 5.3% in 2022-23India's updated consumption data helped offset the World Bank's revised International Poverty Line, reducing the global increase in extreme poverty by 125 million people.

Elon Musk's Starlink gets licence from telecom ministryElon Musk's Starlink has received a crucial licence from India's telecom ministry, paving the way for its satellite internet services in the country.
Elon Musk's Starlink gets licence to launch in India: ReportStarlink had applied for the licence back in 2022, but the process was delayed due to various concerns, including national security.

Sensex jumps over 700 points, Nifty goes past 25,000; Bajaj Finance gains 5%The S&P BSE Sensex jumped 746.95 points to end at 82,188.99, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 252.15 points to close at 25,003.05.

US doubles steel, aluminium tariff: Is it a big worry for India?The tariff hike does not apply to all countries. The United Kingdom has been excluded because of a trade agreement already in place with the US.
RBI rate cut may hurt FDs. Here's what investors should do nowBanks have already begun adjusting their FD rates downward following the RBI's earlier moves since February 2025.

entertainment.headline: Housefull 5 box office Day 3: Akshay's film eyes Rs 100 crore after 1st weekendAkshay Kumar's 'Housefull 5' earned Rs 87 crore in three days. The film directed by Tarun Mansukhani is now inching closer to the Rs 100 crore mark.

Virat, Anushka are soulmates incomplete without each other: IPL photographerPhotojournalist Arun Sharma, who covered IPL 2025, described Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli's bond after RCB's victory over Punjab Kings. He shared their sweet moments after RCB's first IPL win.

Thug Life box office Day 4: Rs 36 crore for Kamal Haasan's film, lowest in 5 yearsKamal Haasan and director Mani Ratnam's 'Thug Life' minted Rs 36.52 crore nett in its first weekend in theatres. This is Haasan's lowest opening numbers in recent years.

Nayanthara's poetic anniversary post for Vignesh overflows with love, romanceNayanthara and Vignesh Shivan are celebrating three years of togetherness on June 3. The actor's special post for her husband is just dripping love.

Sonakshi Sinha down with fever, husband Zaheer Iqbal lifts her mood. WatchSonakshi Sinha, currently down with fever, was seen cuddling with husband Zaheer Iqbal in a playful video where he tried to cheer her up. Fans loved their light-hearted interaction, calling it adorable and heartwarming.

Bigg Boss OTT 3 winner Sana Makbul hospitalised, friend shares updateSana Makbul, winner of 'Bigg Boss OTT 3', was hospitalised shortly after celebrating Eid with her family. The actor received an emotional support message from her friend, Dr Aashna Kanchwala, praying for her speedy recovery.

Kapil Sharma clicks pics, shares warm moment with Sitaare Zameen Par cast. WatchKapil Sharma shared an inside video from Aamir Khan's musical evening. In the clip, he was seen warmly interacting with the cast of 'Sitaare Zameen Par', including debutant actors with special needs.

Actor Jared Leto accused of sexual misconduct by nine women, including minorsOscar-winning actor Jared Leto has been accused by nine women of sexual misconduct, including inappropriate behaviour with underage girls. The actor and his representatives have denied all allegations, calling them false.

Boman Irani attends French Open as birthday surprise, calls it dream come true. PicsBoman Irani fulfilled his childhood dream by attending the French Open in Paris, a surprise birthday gift from his family. The actor shared his experiences through photos and videos on Instagram.

Badshah defends his Dua Lipa remark after severe backlash: Not my mindset, yoursRapper Badshah stirred controversy with a bold comment about Dua Lipa which drew heavy criticism online. He defended his remark as a form of admiration, claiming the backlash reflected others' thinking, not his.

Salman Khan flew to New York, called my husband during treatment: Sonali BendreSonali Bendre recently opened up about Salman Khan's unwavering support during her cancer battle. In a recent interview, she recalled how the superstar flew to New York multiple times and regularly checked in on her throughout her treatment.

Dipika Kakar celebrates Eid in hospital with Shoaib Ibrahim amid Cancer recoveryTV actor Dipika Kakar celebrated Eid al-Adha with husband Shoaib Ibrahim in the hospital. The latter shared a photo on his Instagram Story featuring the couple holding Eidi envelopes.

Akshay Kumar goes incognito to get Housefull 5 reviews, fans reactIn a hilarious turn of events, a masked Akshay Kumar was seen outside a theatre, seeking honest reactions from the audience about his latest film, 'Housefull 5'. The comedy entertainer hit theatres on June 6.

Aamir Khan, girlfriend Gauri Spratt leave Delhi airport hand-in-hand. WatchAamir Khan was clicked with girlfriend Gauri Spratt at the Delhi airport on Saturday. The couple were seen holding hands while exiting the airport.

Diljit Dosanjh shares BTS pics from Sardaar Ji 3 sets, says teaser coming soonDiljit Dosanjh shared behind-the-scenes photos from the sets of 'Sardaar Ji 3', shot at scenic locations abroad. The horror-comedy film, co-starring Neeru Bajwa, is set to release worldwide on June 27, 2025.

Anurag Kashyap claps back at Netflix CEO Ted Sarandos for his Sacred Games remarkNetflix CEO Ted Sarandos reflected on 'Sacred Games' as Netflix India's first original, suggesting a more populist start could have been better, sparking backlash from co-creator Anurag Kashyap. The filmmaker shared his reaction on Instagram.

Pawan Kalyan wraps OG shoot, makers announce with new posterPawan Kalyan has completed shooting for his much-awaited action film 'OG', directed by Sujeeth. The makers have announced that the film will release in theatres on September 25, 2025.

Kamal Haasan urges voluntary language learning, opposes Hindi imposition in SouthKamal Haasan has spoken out against the imposition of Hindi in southern India. He stressed that education should be free from language imposition and focus on the most efficient learning paths.

Thug Life box office Day 3: Kamal Haasan, Silambarasan's film crawls past Rs 30 croreKamal Haasan and Mani Ratnam's much-anticipated collaboration 'Thug Life' is struggling at the box office. Following a sharp drop in collections on Day 2, the film barely managed to cross the Rs 30-crore mark by the end of Day 3.

general news.headline: Meghalaya honeymoon case: Wife had affair, hired hitmen to kill husband, detainedIndore tourist Raja Raghuvanshi was allegedly killed by men hired by his wife, Sonam, during their honeymoon, Meghalaya Director General of Police Idashisha Nongrang said.

Alcaraz remains King of Clay, outlasts Sinner in longest French Open finalCarlos Alcaraz edged past Jannik Sinner in an epic five-set French Open final, cementing his status as the new King of Clay. The marathon battle, which lasted 5 hours and 29 minutes, signalled the dawn of a thrilling rivalry set to define the post-Big Three era.

Israeli forces intercept Gaza-bound aid boat carrying Greta Thunberg, divert itIsraeli forces intercepted a British-flagged aid boat headed to Gaza, detaining 12 activists — including Greta Thunberg and Rima Hassan — who were attempting to breach the longstanding naval blockade.

Meghalaya Police is lying: Father of Indore woman detained for husband's murderSonam Raghuvanshi, 24, was detained in Ghazipur earlier today, nearly 10 days after the body of her husband, Raja Raghuvanshi, was recovered from a deep gorge in Meghalaya.

Nayanthara's poetic anniversary post for Vignesh overflows with love, romanceNayanthara and Vignesh Shivan are celebrating three years of togetherness on June 3. The actor's special post for her husband is just dripping love.

News Menu, June 9: Rahul Gandhi vs poll body escalates, Chirag Paswan's bold moveIndia Today's Monday news menu serves a fiery blend of Rahul Gandhi's battle with the poll body over the 'fixed' Maharashtra Assembly results, Chirag Paswan's announcement to contest all seats in the upcoming Bihar polls, Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah distancing his government from the stampede deaths, and more.

They spit, we hit: Trump warns as Los Angeles immigration protest turns violentUS President Trump warned of strong action after protests in Los Angeles turned tense. Tear gas and pepper balls were used without warning as crowds opposed federal immigration raids.

5 Grand Slams at 22 years, 1 month, 3 days, like Nadal: Alcaraz calls it destinyCarlos Alcaraz called it destiny as he levelled Rafael Nadal's tally of grand slam wins at the same age with his thrilling comeback against Jannik Sinner in the final of the French Open 2025 on Sunday, June 8.

Murder on honeymoon: What drove wife to plot Indore man's killing in Meghalaya?A senior police official from Meghalaya told India Today TV that it was a cold-blooded murder, adding that the trip had been planned to kill Raja. The cop also said that, after a preliminary probe, an extramarital affair appears to be the primary motive.

Mutual respect will guide us: Yunus writes to PM Modi amid strained tiesIndia and Bangladesh reaffirm their commitment to work together for their people's welfare, says Bangladesh's Chief Adviser Muhammad Yunus in a letter to PM Narendra Modi. Despite ongoing political tensions, the leaders expressed hope that shared values will guide stronger ties between the two countries.

World now knows truth: Tharoor-led delegation on Op Sindoor wraps up US visitA delegation of Indian MPs led by Congress leader Shashi Tharoor wrapped up their US visit, where they met top officials to brief about Operation Sindoor. This mission was India's response to the Pahalgam terror attack. The US strongly supported India's stand against terrorism during these talks.

Op Sindoor feather in cap of Modi government? 100%, says Chandrababu NaiduSpeaking to India Today TV, Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu spoke about a host of issues, including Operation Sindoor, One Nation One Election, Waqf Act, calling for demonetising Rs 500 notes to tackle corruption and so on.

Biden 2.0 here we go: Internet mocks Trump after stumble on Air Force One stepsPresident Trump stumbled while climbing Air Force One steps, sparking jokes online comparing him to Joe Biden. Both Trump and Marco Rubio had trouble boarding the plane. The video went viral, and many social media users questioned Trump's health and fitness for office.

Ronaldo breaks down in tears as Portugal beat Spain to clinch Nations LeagueLegendary Cristiano Ronaldo could not hold back his tears as Portugal beat Spain to clinch the Nations League. Portugal, held to a 2-2 draw at extra time, beat Spain in the penalties.

Actor Jared Leto accused of sexual misconduct by nine women, including minorsOscar-winning actor Jared Leto has been accused by nine women of sexual misconduct, including inappropriate behaviour with underage girls. The actor and his representatives have denied all allegations, calling them false.

Rajasthan man, 95, marries 90-year-old partner after 70 years of live-in relationshipA couple from Rajasthan's Dungarpur who shared a life together for seven decades, recently got married with full traditional rituals as they proved it's never too late to honour love.

Virat, Anushka are soulmates incomplete without each other: IPL photographerPhotojournalist Arun Sharma, who covered IPL 2025, described Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli's bond after RCB's victory over Punjab Kings. He shared their sweet moments after RCB's first IPL win.

Delhi sweats through humid night; heatwave grips Jammu regionThe humidity levels were as high as 70 per cent on Sunday night across the national capital. Although the recorded temperature at 5.30 am was 28.6 degrees Celsius, it felt like 32 degrees due to high humid conditions.

Watch: Tear gas, pellets fired at Los Angeles protesters without warningPolice and National Guard in Los Angeles fired tear gas and pepper balls at protesters without warning. People had gathered to oppose immigration raids ordered by Trump. The crowd was pushed back near a federal building, and many were hit as chaos broke out after a brief clash.

No government event: Siddaramaiah blames police, organisers for Bengaluru stampedeAt least 11 people were killed, and 56 others were injured in the stampede that broke out during RCB's felicitation ceremony in Bengaluru on June 4.

Indian astronaut completes full dress rehearsal with Ax-4 crew ahead of space launchIndian astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla gears up for space as the Ax-4 crew completes final launch rehearsal with SpaceX ahead of June 10 liftoff from NASA's Kennedy Space Center. The mission marks India's return to human spaceflight after four decades.
2 killed as fire breaks out at Delhi residential buildingThe fire broke out in Delhi's Dilshad Garden area at around 11.30 pm on Sunday night.

Bengal woman confined for 6 months, beaten with iron rods for refusing porn workA woman from West Bengal is battling for her life after she was held hostage in a flat for months, where she was assaulted and tortured by a man and his mother for refusing to shoot pornographic videos and work as a bar dancer.

FBI chief's 'hit a cop, you're going to jail' warning sparks online outrageSocial media users took a quick note of Kash Patel's warning to the protesters and hit back at the FBI chief, calling him out for the federal agency's different stance taken on the January 6 rioters.

sports.headline: 3 winners in Paris: Federer's heartwarming post after epic French Open finalRoger Federer posted a heartwarming message for Carlos Alcaraz and Jannik Sinner after their epic French Open final on Sunday, June 8. Alcaraz staged a stunning comeback to beat Sinner in five sets.

Sinner explains why his father had to skip French Open final vs AlcarazJannik Sinner explained the reason why his father had to miss the epic French Open 2025 final against Carlos Alcaraz on Sunday, June 8. Sinner lost an epic battle against Alcaraz which went on for 5 hours and 29 minutes.

Alcaraz vs Sinner: A Roland Garros epic promising a golden post-Big Three eraFrench Open 2025: Carlos Alcaraz and Jannik Sinner's epic Roland Garros final reignited the fire of men's tennis, ushering in a thrilling new chapter beyond the Big Three. Their fierce, five-hour, 29-minute duel was a bold promise of greatness to come.

Ronaldo breaks down in tears as Portugal beat Spain to clinch Nations LeagueLegendary Cristiano Ronaldo could not hold back his tears as Portugal beat Spain to clinch the Nations League. Portugal, held to a 2-2 draw at extra time, beat Spain in the penalties.

Watch: Alcaraz salutes Sinner in touching speech after French Open epicCarlos Alcaraz staged a remarkable comeback to defeat Jannik Sinner in the longest French Open final ever. After the thrilling match, Alcaraz shared a glowing tribute for Jannik Sinner.

2nd unofficial Test, Day 3: Easwaran gives strong audition for No.3 roleAbhimanyu Easwaran's patient knock of 80 runs helped India A take a strong lead on Day 3 against England Lions. The performance boosts his chances for India's top-four batting slot amid tough competition.

The marathon battle, which lasted 5 hours and 29 minutes, signalled the dawn of a thrilling rivalry set to define the post-Big Three era.

Pakistan to appoint all-format captain after Mike Hesson's arrival as coachPakistan Cricket Board is set to make major changes including appointing Salman Ali Agha as all-format captain. The board will also establish an observatory committee to monitor cricket developments and reshape the selection process.

Gauff deserves credit: Sabalenka clarifies emotional outburst after backlashAryna Sabalenka has clarified her emotional outburst after losing the French Open 2025 final to Coco Gauff. In a statement, Sabalenka said that she was not discrediting Gauff's effort in the final and praised her for the maiden French Open title.

South Africa's road to WTC Final: Crucial draw vs India, domination at homeWTC Final 2025: Temba Bavuma-led South Africa have reached the World Test Championship final for the first time. Their dominant home performances set up a clash with defending champions Australia.

The marathon battle, which lasted 5 hours and 29 minutes, signalled the dawn of a thrilling rivalry set to define the post-Big Three era.

The board will also establish an observatory committee to monitor cricket developments and reshape the selection process.

In a statement, Sabalenka said that she was not discrediting Gauff's effort in the final and praised her for the maiden French Open title.

South Africa's road to WTC Final: Crucial draw vs India, domination at homeWTC Final 2025: Temba Bavuma-led South Africa have reached the World Test Championship final for the first time. Their dominant home performances set up a clash with defending champions Australia.

Luciano Spalletti sacked as Italy head coach days after Norway thrashingLuciano Spalletti's time as Italy head coach ends just months before a crucial World Cup push, following a dismal loss to Norway. The Azzurri must now regroup to avoid another qualification disaster.

Brazil forward Neymar tests positive for Covid-19Brazil forward Neymar has tested positive for COVID-19 and is sidelined by Santos. This raises questions about his playing future as his contract nears expiry.

Spain vs Portugal UEFA Nations League Final Live Streaming detailsA generational showdown awaits as Cristiano Ronaldo's Portugal take on Lamine Yamal's Spain in the UEFA Nations League final. Here's when and where you can live-stream this epic clash in India.

Olympic champions Errani, Paolini win French Open women's doubles titleItalian pair Sara Errani and Jasmine Paolini claimed the French Open women's doubles crown. Their victory adds a Grand Slam title to their recent Olympic gold, highlighting their dominance on clay courts.

IPL needs 12-16 week window to match NFL hype: Punjab Kings co-ownerPunjab Kings co-owner Mohit Burman has called for a longer IPL season to elevate its global brand value. He believes a 12–16 week window is essential for deeper engagement, better storytelling, and long-term growth.\

Yashaswini stuns Fan Siqi as U Mumba, Jaipur Patriots dominate in UTTIndia's Yashaswini Ghorpade handed Fan Siqi her first loss of the season as U Mumba TT and Jaipur Patriots registered commanding wins in the IndianOil Ultimate Table Tennis League Season 6 in Ahmedabad.

Men's singles final Highlights: Alcaraz scripts comeback win vs Sinner for second titleFrench Open 2025 men's singles final Highlights: Carlos Alcaraz outclassed Jannik Sinner with a comeback special in what was an enthralling 5-set thriller in Paris. Alcaraz lifts his second Roland Garros title, after a sensational battle against an equally brilliant Sinner.

Olympic champions Errani, Paolini win French Open women's doubles titleItalian pair Sara Errani and Jasmine Paolini claimed the French Open women's doubles crown. Their victory adds a Grand Slam title to their recent Olympic gold, highlighting their dominance on clay courts.

IPL needs 12-16 week window to match NFL hype: Punjab Kings co-ownerPunjab Kings co-owner Mohit Burman has called for a longer IPL season to elevate its global brand value. He believes a 12–16 week window is essential for deeper engagement, better storytelling, and long-term growth.\

Alcaraz lifts his second Roland Garros title, after a sensational battle against an equally brilliant Sinner.

Shreyas Iyer should've slapped me: Shashank on PBKS' skipper angry outburstPunjab Kings (PBKS) batter Shashank Singh has said that Shreyas Iyer should've slapped him instead of just scolding him after his careless run out against Mumbai Indians (MI) in Qualifier 2 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Lions vs India A, Day 3 Stumps: India lead by 184 runs at end of day's playEngland Lions vs India A Day 3 Stumps: Abhimanyu Easwaran's 80-run knock has helped India take a big lead of 184 runs. Bad light has ended the day's play early. Nitish Kumar Reddy and Dhruv Jurel were at the crease when the umpires decided to call off the game.

Adrian le Roux joins Team India as strength and conditioning coach in EnglandAdrian le Roux has joined the Indian men's cricket team as their new strength and conditioning coach ahead of the five-match Test series in England. Le Roux appeared in a training video shared by the BCCI.

Sai Sudharsan manifested India Test call-up with Dukes ball practice: Alec StewartFormer England cricketer Alec Stewart has revealed how Sai Sudharsan manifested his India Test call-up with Dukes ball practice at home during his County stint with Surrey.

Watch: Priya Saroj sheds tears of joy after engagement to Rinku SinghSamajwadi Party MP Priya Saroj was seen shedding tears of joy on stage after exchanging rings with Indian cricketer Rinku Singh in Lucknow on Sunday, June 8. The couple got engaged at the luxurious Centrum Hotel, with guests from both the cricketing and political circles in attendance to bless the newly engaged pair.

Cricketer Rinku Singh gets engaged to SP MP Priya Saroj in LucknowIndian cricketer Rinku Singh and Samajwadi Party MP Priya Saroj got engaged on June 8 in a grand ceremony held at The Centrum, a five-star hotel in Lucknow.  In addition to the couple's family members, several high-profile guests from the worlds of cricket and politics attended the ceremony.

Watch: Captain Gill rallies team India in first practice session in EnglandTeam India engaged in an intense practice session ahead of their five-match Test series against England, set to begin from June 20. Captain Shubman Gill and his men were seen fired up during their preparations.

Cheteshwar Pujara interview: Test specialist tag was limiting, not right for meSpeaking to IndiaToday.in, Cheteshwar Pujara and his wife shared their thoughts on the highs and lows of his career, the 'Test specialist' tag, and the inspiration behind the book The Diary of a Cricketer's Wife: A Very Unusual Memoir.

Pochettino denies Tottenham return rumours as Spurs seek new bossUSA head coach Mauricio Pochettino has downplayed rumours linking him with the vacant managerial position at his former club, Tottenham Hotspur, following the sacking of Ange Postecoglou on Friday.

Top 5 rising Indian stars redefining the world of international motor racingA new wave of Indian talent is redefining what global motorsport success looks like. Drivers like Yuven Sundaramoorthy, Shriya Lohia, and Jehan Daruvala are breaking barriers and challenging conventions on international circuits.

It's a shame that Virat and Rohit won't be playing Test series: Chris WoakesEngland all-rounder Chris Woakes recalled his battles with Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma in England and said that it's a shame that the duo won't be a part of the upcoming series.

Can we play tomorrow? Steve Smith ready for WTC Final vs South AfricaSteve Smith has taken a rare break from cricket to prepare for the WTC final against South Africa. His improved fitness and form make him a crucial player for Australia's title defence.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
